text: Zoran Stanković (, ; 9 November 1954 – 5 October 2021) was a Serbian major- general and politician. He was the Minister of Defence between 2005 and 2007. He was also the Minister of Health between 2011 until 2012. Stanković was born in Tegovište, then-Yugoslavia. He ran for President of Serbia in the 2012 election, losing in fifth place. Stanković died on 5 October 2021 in Belgrade, Serbia from COVID-19 at the age of 66.Dr. Zoran Stanković passed away ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Serbian politicians Category:Yugoslavian generals Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Belgrade
title: Zoran Stanković
